text: viśvasiccavare kaṇṭumuṭṭumpēāḷ avar paṟayuṁ: ñaṅṅaḷ viśvasiccirikkunnu enn‌. avar tam'mil taniccukaṇṭumuṭṭumpēāḷ (parasparaṁ kuṟṟappeṭuttikkeāṇṭ‌) avar paṟayuṁ: allāhu niṅṅaḷkk veḷippeṭuttittanna kāryaṅṅaḷ ivarkk niṅṅaḷ paṟaññukeāṭukkukayāṇēā ? niṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāvinṟe sannidhiyil avar niṅṅaḷkketiril at vecc n'yāyavādaṁ naṭattān vēṇṭi. niṅṅaḷentāṇ cintikkāttat
